程序包 com.nonogram

类 SolveGame

java.lang.Object
com.nonogram.GameState
com.nonogram.SolveGame
public class SolveGame
extends GameState
Solve specific game from game state.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    java.lang.Boolean ErrorState()
    Check whether the game is not solvable, called after SolvePipeline().
    void Guess()
    For game with multiple solutions, guess is needed, use dfs search
    void SolvePipeline()
    Solve pipeline, run until no cell changes state, it's deterministic
